item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 1, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Electron Band Structure in Germanium, My Ass (340 points | 97 comments)
2. Bletchley code breaker Betty Webb dies aged 101 (138 points | 16 comments)
3. We Can, Must, and Will Simulate Nematode Brains (31 points | 19 comments)
4. Systems Correctness Practices at AWS: Leveraging Formal and Semi-Formal Methods (27 points | 3 comments)
5. Show HN: Terminal dashboard that throttles my PC during peak electricity rates (20 points | 16 comments)
6. Show HN: Nue – Apps lighter than a React button (513 points | 373 comments)
7. Why F#? (195 points | 150 comments)
8. Interactive article about heart arrhythmias (186 points | 24 comments)
9. Launch HN: ASim (YC S21) – Mobile app that generates mobile apps (11 points | 4 comments)
10. Show HN: Duolingo-style exercises but with real-world content like the news (315 points | 114 comments)
11. CERN scientists find evidence of quantum entanglement in sheep (132 points | 52 comments)
12. Globe Gores (19 points | 3 comments)
13. The April Fools joke that might have got me fired (236 points | 125 comments)
14. Extend (YC W23) is hiring engineers to build LLM document processing ( | hide)
15. Drawing some ovals (that are not ellipses) (11 points | 2 comments)
16. First Orbital Rocket Launched from European Soil, Rocket Crashes, but It's Cool [video] (28 points | 31 comments)

18. Chess324 – A Chess Variant to Reduce Draws (3 points | discuss)
19. Experimental Tauri Verso Integration (91 points | 31 comments)
20. Go Optimization Guide (382 points | 104 comments)
21. US Marines to get high-speed, radar-evading electric seagliders for rescue ops (71 points | 52 comments)
22. Show HN: JavaScript PubSub in 163 Bytes (65 points | 25 comments)
23. KOReader: Open-Source eBook Reader (330 points | 82 comments)
24. The Guardian flourishes without a paywall (534 points | 394 comments)
25. The demoscene as a UNESCO heritage in Sweden (618 points | 81 comments)
26. Netflix's Media Production Suite (205 points | 108 comments)
27. Sales Compensation Simulator – Tool for Founders (80 points | 9 comments)
28. I made a show shuffler that shuffles shows in order (16 points | 7 comments)
29. Jargonic: Industry-Tunable ASR Model (49 points | 7 comments)
30. Interview with the Creator of Deluxe Ski Jump (68 points | 10 comments)
